column4: does ubuntu live cd work ok with nvidia cards? we have 2 machines here, and it won't boot into a gui properly on either.
depends on what nvidia card and which version of the livecd
might wanna try one of the hoary livecds
thank you. i'll download and try
here's a link to the latest
sure, I understand that. but, if i was to install, I presume it's just an apt-get away?
sure. I usually perform daily apt-get dist-upgrades
it's the best debian-based distro out there imho
sounds interesting. have you tried/compared it with mepis?
no, mostly because of kde and the layout
fair enough. I must admit, the layout of the screen shots for ubunto seem very well thought out.
will a daily upgrade keep hoary completely up-to-date?
yep, as long as there were updates that day
and that's for hoary as well as the debian archives? in other words, when gnome 2.10 beta 3 comes out, it will update that to?
